resources.string: Effortless nutrition tracking powered by AI. Discover what affects your health and wellbeing. Here\'s how it works:
Take a photo or describe your meal. Our AI instantly analyzes ingredients, portions, and identifies potential food triggers that might affect how you feel.
Get smart notifications 30 minutes after eating to record how you feel. Track symptoms, energy levels, and overall wellbeing with simple taps or voice notes.
AI analyzes patterns between your meals and symptoms over time, helping you discover food intolerances and optimize your nutrition for better health.
How would you like to log this meal?
